p: The results of the MTE-mp permeation in vitro experiments using the emulgels with and without L are shown in Figure 6, and expressed as the amount of permeate extract/permeation area as a function of the time elapsed. As reported in commercial product data sheet, the synthetic membrane used, Strat-M, is declared to exhibit differential permeability in the presence of enhancers and to be compatible with common formulation formats, making it appropriate for use during formulation optimization.
